text: E'ina hanuge'za ete ru'enena havi anumzante'ene, kasrino agote zantaminte'ma mono'ma huzmante'za kumima nehu'za zamazeri pehenama hu'naza mago'enena osugahaze. Hianagi kumi'ma hu'za zamagenama hunami naza zampintira, zamagu'nevazi'na zamazeri agru ha'nena zamagra Nagri vahe mani'nage'na, Nagra zamagri Anumza manigahue.
